name: DieRoll
0:
”Alexa, open Die Roll.”
”Alexa, ask Die Roll for a roll.”
”Alexa, ask Die Roll for a number.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: die roll
des: Die Roll returns a random number between one and six. Useful for when you need the randomness of a die roll, but don't want to keep rolling physically or don't have a die on hand. Keep your hands free and ask Die Roll!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
